## Form.clear() method

Clears the form. If force, no validation will take place and changes will be ignored

**Signature:**

```typescript
clear(force?: boolean): Promise<boolean>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  force | boolean | _(Optional)_ If true, no validation will occur. |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;boolean&gt;

A promise indicating whether the clearing was successful.
